value.title: Trigger an Azure Event Grid workflow from an IoT device
value.excerpt: Trigger an Azure Event Grid workflow from an IoT device

value.title: Understand Windows Server IaaS Virtual Machine cost management
value.excerpt: You'll be able to use the Pricing calculator to assess likely costs, use Azure Advisor to monitor actual costs for Azure resources, implement Spot VMs and Azure Reservations, and describe benefits of Azure Hybrid licensing.

value.title: Upgrade and migrate Windows Server IaaS virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn to migrate a workload running in Windows Server to an infrastructure as a service (IaaS) virtual machine (VM) and to Windows Server 2019 by using Windows Server migration tools or the Storage Migration Service.

value.title: Track global air quality with Azure Maps
value.excerpt: This module shows how you can track global air quality using the Azure Maps Web SDK and pollution data from a third-party air quality API.

value.title: Use containers for your Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) Apps
value.excerpt: The Language Understanding (LUIS) container loads your trained or published Language Understanding model. As a LUIS app, the docker container provides access to the query predictions from the container's API endpoints

value.title: Using IAAS support with Azure for SAP workloads
value.excerpt: There are a variety of commonly used SAP-certified operating systems supported by SAP running on Azure VMs, and there are also several different methods of provisioning storage for SAP workloads in Azure. In this module, you will learn the SAP recommended support products and VM types as well as the network, database, and monitoring requirements.

value.title: Using IoT Central with Connected Field Service for Dynamics 365
value.excerpt: This module will focus on using IoT Central with Connected Field Service add-on for Dynamics 365 for Field Service.  The module will walk you through building an IoT Central application and escalating the alerts into Dynamics 365.

value.title: Utilize Azure for SAP workloads reference architecture
value.excerpt: Utilize Azure for SAP Workloads Reference Architecture
